title: Charming Country Holiday by the Lake with Champagne on Arrival
description: Built in the 1700’s, the prevailing tranquillity of Storrs Hall Hotel has hosted some of the world’s literary geniuses. Perching itself on a tranquil lake in the British Isles, the residence is in the World Heritage-listed Lake District National Park - only an hour and 30 minutes from Manchester Airport and around three hours’ drive from Edinburgh and Glasgow. Let the world escape you and immerse yourself in the secluded nature of the English countryside with daily buffet breakfast and a welcome glass of champagne on arrival.
offer_address: Storrs Hall Hotel, Windermere LA23 3LG, United Kingdom

title: Idyllic Edwardian Country House Stay in Windermere with Fine-Dining Restaurant
description: Make Linthwaite House your elegant base to explore the charm of Windermere. This Edwardian country house, set amidst 14 acres of private gardens, offers an idyllic escape with panoramic views of Windermere and the surrounding fells. Spend your days teeing up at the Windermere Golf Course or indulging in elevated farm-to-table dining at Henrock. As the sun sets, retreat to the hotel's serene conservatory, sipping on a cocktail while admiring the enchanting vista of the lake.
offer_address: Crook Lane, Bowness-on-Windermere, Windermere LA23 3JA, United Kingdom
